vote.title: A public hearing to receive comments on the proposed use of a portion of Brownwood Park located at 3400 Walnut Hill Lane, totaling approximately 20,159 square feet of land, and temporary use of approximately 7,227 square feet of land by Dallas Water Utilities for the construction of a 36-inch wastewater main and a 10-inch wastewater line for the benefit of the public; and at the close of the public hearing, consideration of a resolution authorizing the proposed use of parkland pursuant to Chapter 26 of the Texas Parks and Wildlife Code - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
